chat_history.message:
Hello,

The parcel 40535309 could not be delivered due to an incorrect or incomplete address.

Please provide us with the correct address, the recipient's name, and phone number. Alternatively, you may ask the carrier to reschedule the delivery.

Thank you.

Regards
Mandi Xhaferaj

Dear ecomobile,

I would like to give you the customer's address:

Eugenie kieu
84 Rue de la Bonne Aventure
78000 Versailles
France
0611595973
eugeniethv@gmail.com

Thank you in advance for your help.

Regards,
Elodie from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Thank you for the information and we have updated our logistics partner with these information.

Regards,
Xt

Hello,

My iPhone 13 is experiencing the issue above.
Thank you for your help,

Bonjour,

Le vendeur n'est pas en mesure de traiter le retour en raison du problème suivant :
Autre.
Plus de détails ont été ajoutés dans le message suivant : Dear Backcare,

The device was purchased as a GOOD condition. According to the Quality Charter, GOOD condition requires the device to be free of scratches on the screen. The customer has had the device for a certain amount of time. This suggests that he was satisfied with the device condition upon receipt.

Now that the device has visible scratches upon return, the grade is degraded to a FAIR condition.

Hence, a €40 deduction will be made once we have completed the diagnosis of the phone and confirm that there are no further issues with it. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer.

Attached are photos of the condition of the phone that we have received.

Thank you.

Regards,
TB

Dear ecomobile

I am contacting you to inform you that the customer would like a full refund for his order.

Please contact the SSC to inform them of the situation once the refund has been processed.

Regards,
Tony from the Back Care Team

Bonjour,

Le vendeur n'est pas en mesure de traiter le retour en raison du problème suivant :
Autre.
Plus de détails ont été ajoutés dans le message suivant : Dear Backcare,

As mentioned, the device was purchased as a GOOD condition. According to the Quality Charter, GOOD condition requires the device to be free of scratches on the screen. The customer has had the device for a certain amount of time. This suggests that he was satisfied with the device condition upon receipt.

Now that the device has visible scratches upon return, the grade is degraded to a FAIR condition.

However, to provide a satisfactory outcome for the customer, we are amenable to a €30 deduction instead. Please check with the customer on this and get back to me.

Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Hello ecomobile,

Would it be possible for you to provide me with a picture of the item with the screen on please?


Looking forward to your return.

Sincerely,

Julianna from Back Market.

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our logistics partner has only provided us with only the following pictures below as proof. However, as seen in the pictures attached, the screen of the device is clearly and visibly scratched. The customer has had the device for 2 weeks, this suggests that he was satisfied with the device condition upon receipt. Hence, a €30 deduction has to be made since the grade has dropped from GOOD to FAIR. We hope that you understand the situation. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Hello ecomobile,

Thank you for your message.

Indeed, the customer disputes that the screen is scratched.
He provided me with a photo of the article proving that the screen was intact before the return, he even adds that there is a protective screen on the phone.

Sincerely,

Julianna from Back Market.

Dear Backcare,

Please inform the customer to take the picture when the phone is shut down. The picture should contain the IMEI of the phone in the general setting.This is to ensure that the light will not affect the extistence of scratch on the monitor screen and ensure the correct product is taken.


Thank you.

Regards,
KW

Hello ecomobile,

Please proceed with the refund as the customer has accepted.

Sincerely,

Julianna from Back Market.

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the partial refund. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
AS
